inclusion.criterion: Aortic valve area ≤1,2 cm2 and/or transaortic maximal velocity (VmaxAO) of 3,0-5,0 m/s
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sinus rhythm >60/min after 5 minutes of rest
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Safe birth control management for women of childbearing potential.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Negative urine-HCG for women of childbearing potential
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand the written patient information and to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Systolic BP <100 mmHg after 5 minutes of rest
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Left ventricular posterior wall thickness >17 mm
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Signs or history of major myocardial infarction and/or severe ischemic heart disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Severe asthma or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has critical aortic stenosis, severe global hypokinesis, and dilated ascending aorta. He also underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
